title: Commencement Apparel
description: Graduation at PA is iconic. But how can we ensure that all students feel included?

questions.text: What is your opinion on attire norms at Commencement?
questions.description: Typically, students wear either blue blazers or white dresses for the entire event depending on their gender.

questions.text: Would you support a change in Commencement attire to a dress code that is less dependent on one's gender identity?
Would you support a change to graduation gowns during the Commencement ceremony?
questions.description: Graduation gowns are the robes typically worn at university graduation ceremonies.
